pages.text: You can restore or create new crystals using the $(l:blocks/restoration_apparatus)Restoration Apparatus$(/l). Simply right-click with a crystal to put it in, then right click with an essence bottle to put it in. You can right-click to get the essence bottle out, and right-click while sneaking to get the crystal out. You can only create new crystals from a drained crystal, but you can restore any crystal if the essence is the same type.
